content.text: Using Styles in AI Prompts for Images and Videos

Understanding and incorporating specific styles into your AI prompts is crucial for generating consistent, high-quality visuals. Whether you're creating images or videos, style direction gives the AI a clear creative framework.

content.caption: Different visual styles dramatically change the mood and feel of AI-generated content

content.text: Film Noir — A classic style from the 1940s and 1950s, characterized by dark, moody visuals with high contrast lighting, deep shadows, and dramatic angles.

content.title: Film Noir AI Prompt
content.code:
A detective standing under a flickering streetlight in a rain-soaked alley,
film noir style, high contrast black and white, deep shadows,
low-angle shot, 1940s atmosphere, venetian blind shadows on face --ar 16:9

content.text: Western — Vast landscapes, dusty towns, cowboys, and golden-hour desert lighting. Evokes classic Sergio Leone and John Ford aesthetics.

content.title: Western AI Prompt
content.code:
A lone cowboy riding through Monument Valley at sunset,
western film style, golden hour, wide establishing shot,
red dust clouds, dramatic sky, Ennio Morricone vibes --ar 21:9

content.text: Science Fiction — Futuristic technology, alien worlds, space exploration. Think Blade Runner, Interstellar, or Dune.
Melodrama — Heightened emotions, dramatic compositions, saturated colors. Classic Douglas Sirk or modern Wong Kar-wai aesthetics.
1980s Aesthetic — Neon lights, synthwave colors, VHS grain, retro-futurism. Think Stranger Things or Drive.

content.title: 1980s Aesthetic Prompt
content.code:
A teenager on a BMX bike silhouetted against a neon sunset,
1980s aesthetic, synthwave color palette, VHS grain texture,
retro-futuristic cityscape in background, lens flare --ar 16:9

content.caption: The 1980s aesthetic combines neon colors, VHS textures, and retro-futurism

content.title: Golden Hour Prompt
content.code:
A couple walking on a beach at golden hour,
warm amber light, long shadows, lens flare,
soft focus background, romantic atmosphere,
cinematic composition --ar 2.39:1

content.title: Cyberpunk Lighting Prompt
content.code:
A hacker sitting in a dark room illuminated by multiple monitors,
cyberpunk lighting, neon blue and magenta reflections on face,

content.text: Referencing specific directors in your prompts can instantly communicate a complex visual style.

rows: Low angles, trunk shots, saturated colors
Centered framing, flat compositions, muted palettes

content.title: Wes Anderson Style Prompt
content.code:
A symmetrically composed hotel lobby with pastel pink walls,
Wes Anderson style, centered framing, flat composition,
vintage furniture, bellhop standing perfectly centered,
muted color palette, overhead shot --ar 1.85:1

content.text: Including camera technique references in your prompts gives the AI specific visual instructions.

rows: Everything in frame is sharp from foreground to background
Makes real scenes look like miniatures
Cinematic wide format with characteristic lens flare

content.caption: Different camera techniques create dramatically different visual results

content.text: Combining a director's style with a lighting style and camera technique creates highly specific prompts. Example: 'Wes Anderson style, golden hour lighting, deep focus, symmetrical composition.'
